# Reference
<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Table of Contents

**Classes**

* [`zoneminder`](#zoneminder): This class will install zoneminder
* [`zoneminder::config`](#zoneminderconfig): It manage zoneminder configuration file
* [`zoneminder::install`](#zoneminderinstall): It install zoneminder package and database
* [`zoneminder::service`](#zoneminderservice): It manage service status

## Classes

### zoneminder

This class will install zoneminder

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include zoneminder
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `zoneminder` class.

##### `package_name`

Data type: `String`

name of the package

##### `package_ensure`

Data type: `String`

desired state of the package

##### `service_name`

Data type: `String`

name of the service

##### `service_ensure`

Data type: `String`

desired state of the service

##### `custom_conf_file`

Data type: `String`

file name of custom configuration

##### `run_user`

Data type: `String`

user to run service as

##### `run_group`

Data type: `String`

group to run service as

##### `db_package_name`

Data type: `String`

name of backend database's package

##### `dbhost`

Data type: `String`

host running backend database

##### `dbname`

Data type: `String`

name of the backend database

##### `dbuser`

Data type: `String`

username for connection to backend database

##### `dbpass`

Data type: `String`

password for connection to backend database

##### `service_enable`

Data type: `Boolean`



### zoneminder::config

This class is meant to be called from `zoneminder`
It manage zoneminder configuration file

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include zoneminder::config
```

### zoneminder::install

This class is meant to be called from `zoneminder`
It install zoneminder package and database

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include zoneminder::install
```

### zoneminder::service

This class is meant to be called from `zoneminder`
It manage service status

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include zoneminder::service
```
